{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3399787,"name":"","username":"WilliamLi0623","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/williamli0623/{size}/195602_2.png","created_at":"2024-06-18T13:50:10.399Z","cooked":"
  1. After Multiple restarts you can see the recovery environment. Select “Safe Mode with Network”
  2. After you log into Windows, Press Win+X to open Windows Powershell (Admin) or CMD (Admin)
  3. Enter: regedit, and then press Enter
  4. Do the following:
    English Version:
    Redirecting
    Chinese Version:
    Redirecting 为MSIServer在Network类别中添加一个项
  5. Enter: net start MSIServer
    in the Powershell or CMD Window you opened and press Enter
  6. Navigate to: C:\ProgramData\National Instruments\MDF\ProductCache\NI-PCI Bridge Driver [Version Here, May be different for yours] run pcibrd64.msi and pcibrd32.msi. After running, restart.
  7. You should be able to boot your computer normally now.
